definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: Last year a case of shocking murder happened in the Politics and Law University of China.
sentences.chinese: 去年中國政法大學發生一起震驚的兇殺案。

sentences.english: The police cracked a murder case last week.
sentences.chinese: 警察上週偵破了一件兇殺案。

sentences.english: Murder at a famous art museum.
sentences.chinese: 講的是在一個著名的藝術博物館裏發生的兇殺案。

sentences.english: The police are going into the murder case.
sentences.chinese: 警察正在調查這宗兇殺案。

sentences.english: Many parents blame that there is too much violence and gunplay in TV programs.
sentences.chinese: 許多家長批評電視節目太多兇殺和槍戰。

sentences.english: The stabbing was the first slaying on campus since then.
sentences.chinese: 這次事件是自那時起的第一件兇殺案。

sentences.english: This film is stuffed with blood and murder.
sentences.chinese: 這部影片中充斥着暴力和兇殺。

sentences.english: Bian Zhongyun's murder is of historical importance.
sentences.chinese: 卞仲耘兇殺案具有歷史的重要性。

sentences.english: The film showed the most horrific murder scenes.
sentences.chinese: 那部影片中出現了極其可怕的兇殺場面。

sentences.english: The murder was committed between a quarter to ten and the hour.
sentences.chinese: 兇殺案在九點四十五分至十點之間發生。

sentences.english: Save the murder mysteries for daytime and pick up a boring book for sleep.
sentences.chinese: 把兇殺神祕的故事留到白天看，儘量挑一些無聊的書。

sentences.english: In Russia, contract-killing is more systematized.
sentences.chinese: 在俄羅斯，買兇殺人多數已形成了體系。

sentences.english: Another doctor Zhiyang has been murdered, and the crime scene is exactly the same as that of Xiong Zhong's.
sentences.chinese: 又一醫生智揚被殺害，兇殺現場和祥忠的如出一轍。

sentences.english: Neither repented they of their murders, nor of their sorceries, nor of their fornication, nor of their thefts.
sentences.chinese: 又不悔改他們那些兇殺，邪術，姦淫，偷竊的事。

sentences.english: Several witnesses deposed concerning potter's guilty behavior when brought to the scene of the murder .
sentences.chinese: 有幾個證人都供述了波特被帶到兇殺場所的畏罪行動。

sentences.english: Police believe that the murder took place between 9 p. m and 1 a. m last night.
sentences.chinese: 警察確信這起兇殺案發生於昨晚9點到凌晨1點之間。

definition: to examine a wound or injury (typically for forensic purposes)
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
unfettered and beyond the law (idiom); evading retribution/getting away with it (e.g. crimes)/still at large
to sensationalize (idiom); deliberate exaggeration to scare people
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
gongs and drums overture to a Chinese opera/to create a disturbance
to shoot with a gun/shooting incident
(of a plot etc) to fall through and stand exposed
